about_the_game:
Explore the Early Challenges of "Go Deep Or Go Home" in this Exclusive Demo


Embark on a thrilling introduction to the dark and perilous world of "Go Deep Or Go Home" with our specially crafted demo. As a knight who awakens with no memory or equipment in a village haunted by the shadow of the Lich King, you are thrust into the depths below to face daunting challenges.



This demo serves as a prelude to the deeper, richer experiences that await in the full version of "Go Deep Or Go Home." Whether you're strategizing battles or managing resources, this preview emphasizes survival and progression in a world where every choice can mean the difference between glory and defeat. Will you rise to reclaim your lost honor, or will the dungeons claim you? The choice is yours—go deep or go home!

Demo Features:


Character Customization: Begin by creating and personalizing your character, setting the stage for your journey.
Focused Questing: Dive into four distinct quests, each increasing in difficulty, designed to showcase the mechanics and intrigue of the full game.
Interactive Gameplay: Engage in the core activities of the game: buy, sell, upgrade, and repair your equipment. Experience the economy of the village through interactions with local merchants and craftsmen.
Combat and Collection: Battle against formidable dungeon denizens and collect valuable items, including potions, scrolls, imbue stones, and glyphs. Each item plays a crucial role in enhancing your equipment with magical effects.
Preview of Full Game Content: While the demo only covers initial stages, it includes key features and content expected in the full game, providing a genuine taste of the adventure to come.

name: Go Deep Or Go Home Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Start your quest as a knight with no past. Customize your character, tackle four introductory quests, and experiment with combat, gear upgrades, and magical enhancements. Experience the foundation of a dark medieval dungeon crawler, and decide your fate: will you go deep, or will you go home?
